answers.answer: Have you had a sleep study? Two years is a long time to suffer from sleeplessness. Diabetes is now being linked in many cases to sleep disorders. My personal (not professional) opinion is that I would want to know why before taking meds to sleep. If you were to happen to have sleep apnea, some sleep meds can make it worse.
